title: Cute 3/2 House - Footsteps To Beltline - Fenced Yard - Covered Porch
posting_body: ['Please Do a drive-by first.', 'After that, we can set up a showing.', '814 Hartford Place, Atlanta, GA 30310', '========================================================', '3Br/2Ba Beautiful completely remodeled, like new bungalow style home.', 'Walk to the Beltline and Breweries.', '- Cute kitchen with beautiful counter tops & big breakfast bar', '- High end stainless steel appliances (gas range, fridge, dishwasher)', '- New paint though out the house', '- Beautiful hardwood floors throughout the house', '- New bathroom / tile', '- New light fixtures', '- Nice master bedroom / bath', '- Fireplace', '- Security alarm system', '- Laundry room with washer/dryer in place', '- Huge fenced in backyard', '- Huge covered front porch', '- Nice back porch', '- Fire pit', '- Central heat & air', '- Off street parking', '- Walk to the Beltline / Brewery and the third largest park in Atlanta.', '- Perkerson park has lighted tennis courts and frisbee golf.', '- Close to Oakland City Marta Rail Station / Ft.', 'McPherson redevelopment area', '- Minutes away from GSU & GA Tech', 'Located just minutes from Downtown Atlanta, East Atlanta Village, Grant Park, Little 5 Points and the new Edgewood and Moreland retail districts.', 'Great downtown living.', '3 min.', 'from 75/85 and 20.', '10 Min.', 'away from Hartsfield International Airport.', 'Move in ready: Aug. 1st 2022', 'Lease: 1 year or longer', 'Rent: $1,595 plus all utilities', 'Pet fee per dog: $300', 'Application fee per person: $25', 'Utilities: You are responsible /', 'In your name (electricity, gas, water)', 'Move-in cost: $700 security deposit plus first and last month’s rent ($3,890 Total)', 'Address: 814 Hartford Place, Atlanta, GA 30310']
